 #include <sys/time.h>
+#include <assert.h>
 
 class timer {
- public:
-    timer() {
-        start();
+public:
+    timer(bool startnow = true)
+        : running_(false), elapsed_({0,0}){
+        if (startnow)
+            start();
     }
 
     void start() {
+        assert(!running_);
+        running_ = true;
         gettimeofday(&start_, NULL);
     }
 
-    struct timeval elapsed() {
+    void pause() {
         struct timeval now, delta;
+        assert(running_);
+        running_ = false;
         gettimeofday(&now, NULL);
         timeval_subtract(&delta, &now, &start_);
-        return delta;
+        timeval_add(&elapsed_, &delta, &elapsed_);
+    }
+
+    void reset() {
+        running_ = false;
+        elapsed_ = (struct timeval){0,0};
+    }
+
+    void add(timer &other) {
+        assert(!running_);
+        struct timeval elapsed = other.elapsed();
+        timeval_add(&elapsed_, &elapsed_, &elapsed);
+    }
+
+    struct timeval elapsed() {
+        if (running_) {
+            struct timeval now, delta;
+            gettimeofday(&now, NULL);
+            timeval_subtract(&delta, &now, &start_);
+            timeval_add(&elapsed_, &delta, &elapsed_);
+            start_ = now;
+        }
+        return elapsed_;
     }
 
- protected:
+protected:
+    bool running_;
     struct timeval start_;
+    struct timeval elapsed_;
+
+    timer(const timer& rhs);
+    timer operator=(const timer& rhs);
 
     /* Subtract the `struct timeval' values X and Y,
        storing the result in RESULT.
@@ -47,5 +81,29 @@ class timer {
         return x->tv_sec < y->tv_sec;
     }
 
+    static void
+    timeval_add(struct timeval *res, const struct timeval *x,
+                const struct timeval *y)
+    {
+        res->tv_sec = x->tv_sec + y->tv_sec;
+        res->tv_usec = x->tv_usec + y->tv_usec;
+
+        while (res->tv_usec > 1000000) {
+            res->tv_usec -= 1000000;
+            res->tv_sec++;
+        }
+    }
 };
 
+class run_timer {
+public:
+    run_timer(timer& timer)
+        : timer_(timer) {
+        timer_.start();
+    }
+    ~run_timer() {
+        timer_.pause();
+    }
+protected:
+    timer &timer_;
+};
